summary: Complete testing of CyberSentinelle UI/3D enhancement pass (iteration 3). All backend APIs (8/8 tests) passed. All frontend UI enhancements verified working: Matrix Rain background, HexGrid overlay, shimmer text, typewriter animation, animated counters, holographic card hover effects, enhanced 3D Network Topology (17 nodes, hex grid floor, HUD overlay), enhanced 3D Threat Visualization (icosahedron shield, orbiting rings, data streams), NEW Radar Scanner (sweep beam, blips), and navigation persistence.

design_issues.issue: Console warnings: 'width(-1) and height(-1) should be greater than 0' on chart initial render
design_issues.note: Charts render correctly after data loads - cosmetic console warning only

passed_tests: Backend: All 8 API tests passed (health, dataset info, EDA, model metrics, predictions, clustering, monitor)
Homepage: Shimmer text 'CYBERSENTINELLE' with gradient animation
Homepage: Typewriter animation on subtitle
Homepage: HexGrid overlay with pulsing wave effect
Homepage: CyberGlobe 3D background visualization
Homepage: Animated stat counters (97.7%, 125K+, 41, 5)
Homepage: 6 feature cards with holographic hover effects (holo-card class)
Homepage: Terminal section with cyber styling
Homepage: CTA buttons (ACCÉDER AU MONITEUR, NOTEBOOK .IPYNB)
Dashboard EDA: Enhanced 3D Network Topology (17 nodes, 16 connections)
Dashboard EDA: Hex grid floor in Network Topology
Dashboard EDA: HUD overlay text (NODES, CONNECTIONS, THREATS)
Dashboard EDA: Node types (server hexagons, firewall diamonds, client circles, attacker triangles)
Dashboard EDA: Distribution des attaques bar chart
Dashboard EDA: Protocoles réseau pie chart (tcp 77%, icmp 10%, udp 13%)
Dashboard EDA: Top Features bar chart with logarithmic scale
Model ML: Metrics cards (Accuracy 97.70%, Precision 97.70%, Recall 97.70%, AUC 0.9971)
Model ML: Enhanced 3D Threat Visualization with icosahedron shield
Model ML: Orbiting rings around shield
Model ML: Data streams (green normal, red attacks) converging toward shield
Model ML: 200 attack particles in outer region
Model ML: Model comparison chart (Random Forest vs Decision Tree)
Model ML: ROC curve with AUC = 0.9971
Model ML: Feature importance chart
Prediction: NEW Radar Scanner with sweep beam and concentric rings
Prediction: Radar blips (green for normal, red for attacks)
Prediction: Compass labels (N/S/E/W)
Prediction: Demo Normal → 'NORMAL' result (76.0% confidence)
Prediction: Demo Attack → 'INTRUSION' result (65.0% confidence) with 'DoS Attack Detected' badge
Prediction: Radar color changes based on result (green for normal, red for attack)
Prediction: Toast notifications working
Clustering: Auto-loads results on page mount
Clustering: 2D PCA scatter plot with 2 clusters
Clustering: Silhouette score (0.0570)
Clustering: Cluster sizes bar chart
Matrix Rain: Fixed-position canvas at z-index 0 with low opacity (~0.04)
Matrix Rain: Visible on all pages (Homepage, Dashboard, Model, Prediction, Clustering)
Navigation: Sidebar persists across all pages
Navigation: All navigation links work correctly
context_for_next_testing_agent: All UI/3D enhancements working correctly. Key canvas-based 3D visualizations: NetworkTopology3D (17 nodes with hex floor), ThreatVisualization3D (icosahedron shield with orbiting rings and data streams), RadarScanner (sweep beam with blips). MatrixRain and HexGrid provide background effects. All use pure HTML5 Canvas 2D context with manual 3D projection (NOT React Three Fiber). Console warnings about chart dimensions are cosmetic only.
